name: @rsthn/xui
description: UI Toolkit to build web based tools.

scripts.clean-css: if not exist dist (mkdir dist) && del /q dist\*.css && del /q dist\*.png
scripts.clean-js: if not exist dist (mkdir dist) && del /q dist\*.js
scripts.build-css: npm run clean-css && parcel build less/index.less --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-cache
scripts.build-js: npm run clean-js && parcel build src/index.js --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-cache
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js

author: RedStar Technologies
